column10: I love it so much.

"Heroes of the Three Kingdoms 2" is an ancient game from 1999.  It's a whopping 25 years old at the time of this review.  The game lacks support for any modern gaming display resolutions (or widescreen monitors), hasn't been modernised or updated to run smoothly on modern gaming PCs.  Despite this lack of modernisation, it carries a pretty high price tag for such an ancient game.  This seems to have been put on Steam as a nostalgia gouge, or just a cash grab to try profit from abandonware.

It's an old Chinese turn based strategy game... there's no English translation, but the age of the game disqualifies it from recommendation even before language is taken into account.  This is an extremely ancient game and badly dated.  There's no value here apart from nostalgia. 

From a technical perspective, the game doesn't meet basic minimum requirements that most PC gamers expect as standard.

There's no option to change the resolution and no useful graphics tweaks.  There's no way to ensure this is running at the native resolution of your display.  There's no guarantee this game will look right on any PC as a result of this hamfisted design decision.

The game only displays in 4:3 pillarboxed aspect ratio, due to the age of the game, it predates the 16:9 widescreen gaming standard established back in 2006.  It's possible they're marketing this towards people using an old CRT they found in a dumpster, or this game is being specifically marketed towards people gaming on PC's from 1995... either way, this isn't really acceptable in the modern era of PC gaming.  It's obviously not going to look right on a modern 16:9 gaming display.

These technical defects push this game below acceptable standards for any modern PC game.

"Heroes of the Three Kingdoms 2" is relatively expensive for an abandonware nostalgia gouge, at $1 USD, and it's not worth it.  The game is just too old, hasn't been modernised.  And as the old saying goes, you can't go home again.  This is also competing with over 9,000 free games available on Steam, many of them far better than this paid product.

經典回憶，這是我唯一喜歡的三國群英傳遊戲，操作方便容易上手。

這款遊戲的缺點是如果不用密技的話，高等級的武將技和軍師技會玩不到。根據我以前的測試，我用丁原開場(LV2)到統一天下平均等級只有12-13之間，連黑鬃馬都不能用。我也玩過另一個極端玩法就是只招降最強的那批武將，破關時大約只有30多位武將，平均等級才接近40。

如果要玩到這麼極端才能在不使用密技的情況下從低等級玩到高等級，不得不說遊戲的平衡度做得不太好，不過既然密技可以稍微補足這個缺點也就罷了！

倒是以前不斷使用密技研究到底要怎麼拿到赤兔馬和倚天劍卻始終以失敗告終，如果真的是 bug 希望開發商能修一下，如果不是 bug 拜託也跟我們說一下到底怎麼拿。
